markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fulu Compendium](/Equipment.aspx?ID=988)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 161 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 550 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This pamphlet-sized book records the various symbols seen on fulu and also contains some ready-made magic on a special page that restores itself every day at sunrise. Using the compendium as a reference grants a +2 item bonus to any skill checks to determine a fulu's function or authenticity.

<document level="2" id="action-786" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Fulu Compendium
